name: Noia - Bouncing Ball
description:
Noia Bouncing Ball is a simple, addictive, one touch, arcade game where you bounce ball on the platforms and jumping to get high score!

Controls: Noia is a most simple game.
Tap to jump or tap twice to double jump.
Nothing hard.

Each bounce on the platform is one point. Each bounce on the platform gives you a double jump.

The colors of the platforms and other elements change randomly after each attempt.
Collecting floating coins will allow you to unlock new balls! Could you unlock all of them?

Everything seems too easy? The platforms accelerate with every second! Bouncing and jumping on platforms will get harder and harder.
Prove reflex and be high on the table of the best scores from around the world. How far can you go?

Features:
- 100% free game
- A very simple game based on bouncing the ball and avoid spikes
- 16 ball skins to unlock
- Changing the game's colors

Jump into the game!
